channel.title: RANDOM on Sneha Mayya
channel.description: Recent content in RANDOM on Sneha Mayya

item.title: Cliffhanger time >:)
item.description: Hi! I’m here to grant you with something I hate. CLIFFHANGERS!!! Have a nice time!! >:) >:) Charlie opened the door and Wren gasped. This was it. Right in front of them was the castle, as dark as night. The moon illuminated its light upon the castle and gave it a ghostly glow. This was it. The mummy prophecy had predicted this horror from the start. This was their destiny. The teens stared gloomily at the beautiful sight above them and wondered, how could such a beautiful place hold the subject of everybodies nightmares?
